original_title: This man wants you to know the truth about vaccines | CNN
article_summary: Dr. Jake Scott, an infectious disease physician, is combating a "second pandemic" of vaccine misinformation, using social media and op-eds to correct false claims and restore trust in vaccines. His efforts have gained significant attention, with posts reaching millions of views. The decline in vaccination rates and rise of vaccine-preventable diseases like measles and whooping cough are concerning to Scott, who has lost many unvaccinated patients to Covid-19.</s>
